description: Filter a list of data items based on a specified key, filter value, and comparison operator. Check advanced options to select match comparison.

input_data.info: The list of data items to filter.

operator.info: The operator to apply for comparing the values.

success.filtered_data: Successfully filtered {filtered} items out of {total} total items

warnings.missing_filter_params: Filter key or value is missing.
warnings.invalid_items: Warning: {count} items are not Data objects and were skipped.
warnings.items_missing_key: Warning: {count} items don't have the key '{key}' or are not dictionaries.
warnings.no_matches: No items matched the filter criteria (operator: {operator}, key: {key}, value: {value})
